title: New polling memo urges Senate Dems to ‘play hardball’ on ICE
description: The memo from the Searchlight Institute think tank, which was circulating among Senate Democrats, emphasizes reforming the agency.
content: The memo from the Searchlight Institute think tank, which was circulating among Senate Democrats, emphasizes reforming the agency.
